about_the_game:
Gameplay

  • Start with a brand new ship with limited weapons and upgrades.
  • Shoot down Asteroids and Enemy ships for resources (Iron, Gold, Platinum).
  • Use these resources to purchase new upgrades like ship enhancements and new weapons.
  • Your progress will persist and each play session will have you becoming stronger and being able to last longer in the game.

Game Modes

  • Classic - A retro style game mode featuring more classic style endless gameplay.
  • Arcade - A more arcadey experience where randomized upgrades will appear as physical objects for you to acquire and equip. Each game session will be different from the last leading to endless replayability.
  • Chaos Agent - Take on a horde of endless enemies in this boss rush style gameplay. How long can you last before being overrun?
  • Cadet - A spin on the classic gameplay with a more open level approach that has you not only battling against tougher enemies but navigating around dangerous black holes, supernovas, planets and wormholes but also mazes for you to navigate.
  • Galactic Hero - A tougher version of Cadet that will hit harder but will reward higher resources for your success.
  • Survive - A special game mode where you have limited rockets & no rocket regeneration. Each new level you survive, you will be awarded the choice of a new upgrade to continue.
  • Void - Find the special portal to advance to the next level. As you search, take on various hazards of each level.

Demo Features

  • Seven Different Arcade / Roguelite Game Modes
  • Ship Upgrades - Upgrade your play style with new weapons and enhancements over time
  • Local Co-Op / Versus Modes
  • Leaderboards

Gameplay

  • Start with a brand new ship with limited weapons and upgrades.
  • Shoot down Asteroids and Enemy ships for resources (Iron, Gold, Platinum).
  • Use these resources to purchase new upgrades like ship enhancements and new weapons.

  • Chaos Agent - Take on a horde of endless enemies in this boss rush style gameplay. How long can you last before being overrun?
  • Cadet - A spin on the classic gameplay with a more open level approach that has you not only battling against tougher enemies but navigating around dangerous black holes, supernovas, planets and wormholes but also mazes for you to navigate.
  • Galactic Hero - A tougher version of Cadet that will hit harder but will reward higher resources for your success.
  • Survive - A special game mode where you have limited rockets & no rocket regeneration. Each new level you survive, you will be awarded the choice of a new upgrade to continue.
  • Void - Find the special portal to advance to the next level. As you search, take on various hazards of each level.

Demo Features

  • Local Co-Op / Versus Modes
  • Leaderboards

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 12
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Rocket! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Build a stronger ship with each play session as you earn resources needed to upgrade your ship and apply stronger weapons. Customize your ship to your play style and tackle greater and stronger enemies as the levels continue in this endless roguelite.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Portugal, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
